summary: A little boost to the Spellbreaker to improve it lategame.
descriptionHtml:
My first little mod, just to add a recipe to make an upgraded version of spellbreaker. I always found its ward effect grew less and less effective over the course of the game and it seemed to me that a daedric artifact should be more powerful. Rather than just give Spellbreaker a boost, I've added a new Greater Spellbreaker and means to make it. 
To make it you'll need three Dwemer Ingots, a Centurion Dynamo, the original Spellbreaker, and a Spell Tome of Greater Ward. Just a single ESP so it should be easy to install.
author: phantasmalWordsmith
